name: Space Turtle (thatProgrammerSleigh)
description:
A Space Faring Turtle that travels from planet to planet to exterminate Mutant Killer Pies.

Two  Web Developers were bored one day and wanted to make a game. After a few months of development we needed to make a smaller project together to get a morale boost.

After a Game Idea MadLib session, we came up with this...

It's kind of like a Top Down Bullet Hell meets a Boss Rush. Basically each level was planned out to be a specific Pie Boss, where you need to survive a certain length of time for the boss to appear. With a leveling system similar to Vampire Survivors.

We're not sure if we will continue this game, it was my first serious attempt at making Pixel Art and our combined first attempt at making a Full Game. (Albeit with a very strict timeline)
